name: Ghostrick Imp
text: Cannot be Normal Summoned, unless you control a "Ghostrick" monster. If you control no monsters, or all monsters you control are "Ghostrick" monsters: You can Special Summon this card from your hand. If this card is Special Summoned: Declare a level from 1 to 4; You can Special Summon 1 "Ghostrick" monster from your hand or Deck, except "Ghostrick Imp", and if you do, the Levels of both that monster and this card become the level declared, also you cannot Special Summon monsters for the rest of this turn, except "Ghostrick" monsters. You can only use each effect of "Ghostrick Devil" once per turn.
